# PKStrokePath.InterpolatedSlice.Stride

**Enumeration**

The stride between elements of this slice.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Stride
```

## Stride types

- **PKStrokePath.InterpolatedSlice.Stride.distance(_:)**: A stride based on a distance between elements you provide.
- **PKStrokePath.InterpolatedSlice.Stride.parametricStep(_:)**: A stride based on a parametric step value you provide.
- **PKStrokePath.InterpolatedSlice.Stride.time(_:)**: A stride based on a time interval in seconds you provide.

items.description: A stride based on a distance between elements you provide.
